ygData.subject: Haunted Souls of The Tribunal
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi this is Shareece.. Or Holley from the Tribunal. If your interested in Joining and Helping make this a Great Guild.. Plz Look for us. Im from some UBer
ygData.messageBody:
Hi this is Shareece.. Or Holley from the
Tribunal. If your interested in Joining and Helping make
this a Great Guild.. Plz Look for us. Im from some
UBer Guilds. Just wanted to start my own and have
fun..Or guild is a bunch of crazy silly ppl hehe we have
fun and are not a bunch of uptight jerk offs..Those
will be removed in no time.. Also if ya wanna see our
site we have a BB here on Yahoo clubs
Thehauntedsoulsofeverquest,,Hauntedsoulsofeverquest,,.too Or other is
<a href=http://www.geocities.com/haunted_souls0/index.html.we target=new>http://www.geocities.com/haunted_souls0/index.html.we</a> are in the process of changing that ..if anyone
is good with websites plz send me tlz on tribunal..
/e Hugs :)
